<MethodEndpoint

Update quota configurations for a specific user

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"userId","required":true}]}
>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"quotaType":{"type":"string","enum":["daily","weekly_rolling","monthly"]},"quotaLimit":{"type":"number","minimum":1},"bypassApproval":{"type":"boolean"}},"additionalProperties":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
